languages.text: "Воспоем же оба заряда, и тело электрическое, и Омниссию, который зажигает в нас искру разума. И да будем мы нести заряд его тем, кто обратил разум свой к Его свету".

traits.locale_text: "Воспоем же оба заряда, и тело электрическое, и Омниссию, который зажигает в нас Искру разума. И да будем мы нести заряд его тем, кто обратил разум свой к Его свету".

languages.text: "Let us praise the twin charges, the body electric, and the Omnissiah who lights the spark of reason within us. And let us carry His charge to those who have turned their minds toward His light."
languages.original_text: "Воспоем же оба заряда, и тело электрическое, и Омниссию, который зажигает в нас искру разума. И да будем мы нести заряд его тем, кто обратил разум свой к Его свету".

traits.locale_text: "Let us praise the twin charges, the body electric, and the Omnissiah who lights the spark of reason within us. And let us carry His charge to those who have turned their minds towards His light."
"Let us praise the twin charges, the body electric, and the Omnissiah who lights the spark of reason within us. And let us carry His charge to those who have turned their minds towards His light."

"Let us praise the twin charges, the body electric, and the Omnissiah who lights the spark of reason within us. And let us carry His charge to those who have turned their minds toward His light."

languages.text: "Preisen wir die Zwillingsladungen, den elektrischen Körper und den Omnissiah, der den Funken der Vernunft in uns entzündet. Und tragen wir seine Ladung zu all jenen, die ihren Verstand zu seinem Licht hingewendet haben."
languages.original_text: "Let us praise the twin charges, the body electric, and the Omnissiah who lights the spark of reason within us. And let us carry His charge to those who have turned their minds toward His light."

traits.locale_text: "Preisen wir die Zwillingsladungen, den elektrischen Körper und den Omnissiah, der den Funken der Vernunft in uns entzündet. Und tragen wir seine Ladung zu all jenen, die ihren Verstand zu seinem Licht hingewendet haben."

languages.text: « Prions les courants jumeaux, le corps électrique et l'Omnimessie qui attise l'étincelle de raison en chacun de nous. Apportons Son courant auprès de ceux qui ont tourné leur esprit vers Sa lumière. »
languages.original_text: "Let us praise the twin charges, the body electric, and the Omnissiah who lights the spark of reason within us. And let us carry His charge to those who have turned their minds toward His light."

traits.locale_text: « Prions les courants jumeaux, le corps électrique et l'Omnimessie qui attise l'étincelle de raison en chacun de nous. Apportons Son courant auprès de ceux qui ont tourné leur esprit vers Sa lumière. »

languages.text: “让我们共同赞美双电荷与生物电，还有点亮我们内在理性之光的欧姆尼塞亚。愿我们将祂的电荷带给那些皈依祂的光芒之人。”
languages.original_text: "Let us praise the twin charges, the body electric, and the Omnissiah who lights the spark of reason within us. And let us carry His charge to those who have turned their minds toward His light."

traits.locale_text: “让我们共同赞美双电荷与生物电，还有点亮我们内在理性之光的欧姆尼塞亚。愿我们将祂的电荷带给那些皈依祂的光芒之人。”

languages.text: 「表裏一体の電荷を称えさせたまえ。電気を帯びた肉体と、我らに理性の火花を点けし万機神を。万機神の光を求め続ける者に、彼の使命を果たさしめたまえ」
languages.original_text: "Let us praise the twin charges, the body electric, and the Omnissiah who lights the spark of reason within us. And let us carry His charge to those who have turned their minds toward His light."

traits.locale_text: 「表裏一体の電荷を称えさせたまえ。電気を帯びた肉体と、我らに理性の火花を点けし万機神を。万機神の光を求め続ける者に、彼の使命を果たさしめたまえ」

languages.text: «Alabemos a las cargas gemelas, al cuerpo eléctrico y al Omnissiah que enciende en nosotros la chispa de la razón. Y llevemos Su carga a los que han dirigido sus mentes hacia Su luz».
languages.original_text: "Let us praise the twin charges, the body electric, and the Omnissiah who lights the spark of reason within us. And let us carry His charge to those who have turned their minds toward His light."

traits.locale_text: «Alabemos a las cargas gemelas, al cuerpo eléctrico y al Omnissiah que enciende en nosotros la chispa de la razón. Y llevemos Su carga a los que han dirigido sus mentes hacia Su luz».

languages.text: "Çifte yüke, elektrik bedene ve yüreklerimize muhakeme kıvılcımları yayan Hermesih'e şükürlerimizi sunalım. Zihinlerini O'nun ışığına yöneltenlere O'nun mukaddes elektrik yükünü taşıyalım."
languages.original_text: "Let us praise the twin charges, the body electric, and the Omnissiah who lights the spark of reason within us. And let us carry His charge to those who have turned their minds toward His light."

traits.locale_text: "Çifte yüke, elektrik bedene ve yüreklerimize muhakeme kıvılcımları yayan Hermesih'e şükürlerimizi sunalım. Zihinlerini O'nun ışığına yöneltenlere O'nun mukaddes elektrik yükünü taşıyalım."
